abstract: A wide open grid from Elizabeth C. Gorski.
snippet: A wide open grid from Elizabeth C. Gorski.
lead_paragraph: SATURDAY PUZZLE — One of the things I like the most about Elizabeth C. Gorski’s puzzles is the sense of humor that pervades them. And the visuals. I think it’s safe to say that Ms. Gorski is the queen of the visual crossword-puzzle elements.

headline.main: Not Found in This Puzzle’s Answer
